name: Motor Challenge
description:
A racing simulator mixed with interactive fiction. You are a experienced and successful driver in the largest motorsport category on the planet. Your last race should leave in the memory of all your fans everything that you represented for the sport in these years of dedication. Your mission is to finish in the best position possible and close your career with the greatest brilliance.

Important: The car is extremely vulnerable and will not accept that you stumble all the time.

Commands: Mouse only
